name: AXXX - West Dapto - ITC 004 (ITP004) - Clearing and Grubbing, Topsoil Strip
template name: AXXX - West Dapto - ITC 004 (ITP004) - Clearing and Grubbing, Topsoil Strip

name: REQUIREMENTS / REFERENCE: Project Safety Plan, Project Environment Plan
• All site personnel inducted, required SWMS completed and signed, Safety Plan approved
• ERSED controls installed on site, air quality visually monitored for dust etc due to construction activities, Environment Plan approved
• Contact DBYD and complete excavation permit, extent of works set out with survey pegs
• Submit the following, as detailed in WCC 1111 Section 2
• HOLD POINT: Submission of Clearing and Grubbing Plan
• HOLD POINT: Submission of Weed Management Plan
• HOLD POINT: Submission of Clearing Report
• HOLD POINT: Submit a survey plan showing the proposed area for clearing to confirm the clearing perimeters
• HOLD POINT: Peg out area for clearing
• HOLD POINT: Submit a method statement for clearing including proposed methods, equipment and materials
8 - Method Statement for Work in Exclusion Zones
• HOLD POINT: Submit a method statement for work within exclusion zone and driplines
• HOLD POINT: Notice of trees to be protected
• Display a sign in a prominent position at each entrance to site, warning that trees and other plants are to be protected during the contract works
• WITNESS POINT: Mark all trees documented for preservation or transplanting with ribbon markers
• WITNESS POINT: Mark any unsound trees in the road reserve, but outside limits of clearing
• WITNESS POINT: Identify any additional areas that require weed control
• Treatment of cleared vegetation as necessary and as per Section 3.7
• Walk site after completion of clearing to identify any further trees or stumps that require removal
• If the following are encountered, notify client of as-found site conditions: Bad ground, discrepancy in site conditions, rock, springs and seepages, topsoil more than 100mm deep
• Strip topsoil to a maximum depth of 200mm and remove if unsuitable for re-use
• Stockpile topsoil intended for re-use as per Specification requirements
QA ENGINEER / SPE / PE SIGN OFF
